descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
The 1st Multiplayer Horror VR inspired by **Phasmophobia.**
                                                                                                                                          
 [media] 
**discord.gg/hsvr** join to win gifts

# 👻Play with friends, laugh & run!
A game you **work together** to **solve puzzles**, **explore** & **survive scary chase**!
- **3 BIG MAPS**: BigHouse, HighSchool, OldFactory.
- **2 MODES**: Easy Mode for beginners, Crazy Mode with 10 super-powered demons!

[media]

# 👻 Easy to play, can't stop screaming!
1. **Find the Room**: listen to whisper/find the floating stuffs.
2. **So Many Tools**: Pour holy water to track demons, hold a Bible to let them away....
3. **Catch the Evil**: Match right tools & rush to the platform. Trap the demon!
4. **Power-ups**: Use **voice changer** to talk like DonaldDuck, take **pills** to become devil, ring **the bell** to bring your friend alive. Don't let devil kill you!

[media]

# 👻 Heart-pumping chase!
If you enjoy Lethal Company\Animal Company or FNAF vibes, this is your new favorite!

In **Crazy Mode**, demons kill when you are alone. **RUN!**

# 👻 Cool power-ups!
Want to make some fun? Use **speed-up lollipop** to escape chasing, take the **pill** to fake demon, blow on **your controller** to stop them! 
[media]

# 👻 Dress up!
If you like Gorilla Tag or Yeeps' cosmetics, continue here! Get FNAF's Freddy mask, angel avatars...
[media]
